glsa.title: tcpdump: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in tcpdump, the worst of which can allow remote attackers to cause Denial of Service condition or executive arbitrary code.

background.p: tcpdump is a Tool for network monitoring and data acquisition.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in tcpdump. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All tcpdump users should upgrade to the latest version:
